details:
adverb
- in an aggressive manner
= example: in an aggressive manner
= synonyms: aggressively
- in a well delineated manner
= example: in a well delineated manner
= synonyms: crisply
- very suddenly and to a great degree
= synonyms: precipitously
- changing suddenly in direction and degree
= example: changing suddenly in direction and degree
= synonyms: acutely, sharp
